5 ‘O’ level credits at ONE sitting or 6 ‘O’ level credits at TWO sittings to include English Language, Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics with any ONE or TWO of the following subjects as the case may be; Biology, Agricultural Science, Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Economics, Geography, Metal Work and Wood Work and Not below second class lower (first degree)

Masters or MSc programs run for a minimum of 18 months and maximum of 2 years (3 semesters) for full time students and 3 years (5 semesters) for part time students.Students with non-industrial engineering background may be required to audit some selected undergraduate level courses prescribed by department. This may necessitate spending an additional semester on the programme.
PhD programs is 2 years for full time students and 3-5 years for part time students

You must at least 5 ‘O’ level credits at ONE sitting or 6 ‘O’ level credits at TWO sittings to include English Language, Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics with any ONE or TWO of the following subjects as the case may be; Biology, Agricultural Science, Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Economics, Geography, Metal Work and Wood Work

utterances: course outline for all my courses?
answers: The Course Outline/prospectus has been uploaded on the website and you can view it through this link: For Undergraduate Programs: https://ipeui.netlify.app/undergraduate.html For Postgraduate Programs: https://ipeui.netlify.app/postgraduate.html

utterances: know all about the MEM program
answers: The full meaning of MSc is Masters of Science while MEM is Masters of Engineering Management. The MSc is Academic Masters while MEM is Professional Masters. For more details about this, you can visit the link below: https://ipeui.netlify.app/postgraduate.html
The Current Head of Department is Engr. (Dr) Mojisola A. Bolarinwa. Further details on who the HOD is can be accessed through this link: https://ipeui.netlify.app/sectionalHead.html
The co-ordinators for postgraduates and undergraduates are found on the website through this link: https://ipeui.netlify.app/sectionalHead.html

utterances: What is Industrial and Production Engineering
answers: The history of the department is uploaded on the website but you can access it through this link: https://ipeui.netlify.app/mission.html

utterances: know who the lecturers of IPE are
answers: The Lecturers of this prestigious department are all found on the website through the link below: https://ipeui.netlify.app/staff-list.html
The grading system for Masters in UI goes thus: Less than 1.0 = Failure 1.0 to 2.9 = Terminal Masters 3.0 to 3.9 = M.Phil. 4.0 to 4.9 = M.Phil./PhD Greater than or equal to 5.0 = PhD

There are 5 areas of specialization for Masters in Industrial and Production Engineering Department and they are: • Operations Research • Systems Engineering • Engineering Management • Production/Manufacturing • Human Factors/Ergonomics
To get recommendation letter from the department, you will speak to the Head of Department or your supervisor

utterances: Is the department affiliated with COREN
answers: Yes, the department has affiliation with COREN, NSE and some other bodies of engineering but more information on this will be gotten from the HOD

Students proceed on 3 months industrial attachment during the long vacation after their second and third years respectively. In their fourth year during second semester, students are attached to the industry for Students Industrial Work Experience Scheme (SIWES) training
The departmental exam on most occasions come up on the same day as the date for English Proficiency Test (EPT) and it’s a test of your knowledge in Engineering
The documents that are needed for registration in the department are: • School fees receipt • Financial Receipt • Admission Letter • BSc certificate • Passport Photographs

utterances: department admit people without engineering background
answers: No, the department does not admit non-engineering backgrounds for Masters but admits non-engineering priors to MEM because it is a Professional Masters

utterances: process my transcript as a postgraduate?
answers: For Transcript processing or collection, the undergraduates are to start the processing from the department and then refer to the school’s transcript office for collection while postgraduates process and collect theirs at the postgraduate college.

The course advisor for each of the courses in each level would be communicated to you from the department’s administration. Meanwhile, you can access the link below to know the undergraduate and postgraduate co-ordinator in the department: https://ipeui.netlify.app/sectionalHead.html

utterances: programmes offered in the department of industrial and production engineering
industrial and production engineering department programmes
answers: The programmes offered in this department are Undergraduate programme also known as BSc, Masters Programme known as MSc, Professional Master of Engineering Management (MEM), Master of Philosophy (MPhil) and Doctor of Philosophy (PhD)
The Course materials for semesters 1–3 of academic masters can be accessed through this link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1BXAkFuZ8flyW30FJVdIWjFG2Wp2LlVOR?usp=sharing
